lessons.japanese: ジェーンは生け花に興味をもっている。
lessons.indonesian: Jane is interested in flower arrangement.

lessons.japanese: 母は生け花を教えている。

lessons.indonesian: I just started learning flower arrangement last month, so I'm still a beginner.

lessons.indonesian: Flower arrangement is a part of Japanese culture.
